item.title: Do you know about the Magic Methods in Python?

item.title: Understanding Transformers, the Programming Way
item.description: Transformers have become the defacto standard for NLP tasks nowadays. They started being used in NLP but they are now being used in Computer Vision and sometimes to generate music as well.

item.title: A Layman’s Guide for Data Scientists to create APIs in minutes
item.description: Have you ever been in a situation where you want to provide your model predictions to a frontend developer without them having access to model related code?
